column.name: ConnectionType
column.summary: Enum:ConnectionTypes Used to distinguish the connection type.

column.name: AlertType
column.summary: Enum:AlertType Identifies what types of alert this row is associated to.

Enumeration.name: AlertType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 39 - Alert that is created when a procedure or group note's signature is cleared by another user editing that note.

column.name: Type
column.summary: Enum:AlertType Identifies what type of alert this row is.

Enumeration.name: AlertType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 39 - Alert that is created when a procedure or group note's signature is cleared by another user editing that note.

column.name: Autotrigger
column.summary: Enum:EnumAutomationTrigger What triggers this automation

Enumeration.name: EnumAutomationTrigger
Enumeration.EnumValue: 3. Regardless of module. Usually only used with conditions.
5. Attaching a procedure to a scheduled appointment.

column.name: TreatArea
column.summary: Enum:TreatmentArea . Only for frequency limitations, ignored for all other benefits. Enforced by the UI. Example 3 fillings per year [mouth]. 0 means default.

Enumeration.name: TreatmentArea
Enumeration.summary: Used in procedurecode setup to specify the treatment area for a procedure. This determines what fields are available when editing an appointment.

column.name: SecurityHash
column.summary: Holds the salted hash of the following claim fields: ClaimFee, ClaimStatus, InsPayEst, InsPayAmt.

column.name: SecurityHash
column.summary: Holds the salted hash of the following claimproc fields: ClaimNum, Status, InsPayEst, InsPayAmt.

column.name: EServiceCode
column.summary: Enum:eServiceCode EService that this short GUID applies to.

Enumeration.name: eServiceCode
Enumeration.summary: Used by EServiceSignal.ServiceCode. Each service will have an entry here. Stored as an int for forward compatibility.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 47 - ODTouch Mobile application surcharge for additional devices that exceed the ODTouchDeviceLimitDefault pref.

column.name: DrawType
column.summary: Enum:ImageDrawType

Enumeration.name: ImageDrawType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 4 - A series of connected points forming the outline of a closed polygon. Stored same as pen drawing. Polygons only have a fill color, not any outline color.

column.name: ImageAnnotVendor
column.summary: Enum:EnumImageAnnotVendor 0: Open Dental drawings and text, 1:Pearl AI annotations.

column.name: Details
column.summary: Extra space for any text. Currently only used for Pearl annotation categories, relationship properties, and relationship values, which are all stored as a single chunk of user readable text drawn straight to screen when hovering.

column.name: IsEclipboardEnabled
column.summary: Indicates whether the device is allowed to operate the checkin app. For BYOD sessions will always be true because BYOD is authenticated by a unique URL link in a text message.

column.name: EclipboardLastAttempt
column.summary: The date and time of the last attempted login for Eclipboard.

column.name: EclipboardLastLogin
column.summary: The date and time of the last successful login for Eclipboard.

column.name: IsODTouchEnabled
column.summary: Indicates whether this device is being used for ODTouch or not.

column.name: ODTouchLastLogin
column.summary: The date and time of the last successful login for ODTouch.

column.name: ODTouchLastAttempt
column.summary: The date and time of the last attempted login for ODTouch.

column.name: DiagnosticCodes
column.summary: Text to store up to 4 ICD-10 codes. Codes are comma-separated with no whitespace. Used to set the default DiagnosticCode, DiagnosticCode2, DiagnosticCode3, and DiagnosticCode4 fields for new procedures linked to the procedure code. When this field is not empty or null, it will override the ICD9DefaultForNewProcs preference. Example: M26.31,K08.401,K02.51

column.name: DefaultForTypes
column.summary: Enum:EnumQuickPasteType Each Category can be set to be the default category for multiple types of notes. Stored as integers separated by commas.

Enumeration.name: EnumQuickPasteType
Enumeration.summary: Each item in the enum should uniquely describe the location of a single TextBoxOD. No sharing. In many cases, this is tied to QuickPasteCat to determine which category to default to when opening.

column.name: IType
column.summary: Enum:InvalidType Indicates what cache or entity has been changed.

Enumeration.name: InvalidType
Enumeration.summary: When the autorefresh message is sent to the other computers, this is the type.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 111. Used to refresh the billing list when it's open and a patient's account was adjusted. Works immediately on the current computer and at the signal interval of about 10 seconds on other computers.
112. Indicates that database connection settings have changed and the cached connections should be reinitialized.

column.name: ToolBar
column.summary: Enum:EnumToolBar The toolbar to show the button on.

column.name: FkeyType
column.summary: Enum:UserOdFkeyType Specifies which flag is overridden for the specified definition, since an individual definition can have multiple flags.

Enumeration.name: UserOdFkeyType
Enumeration.summary: These FKey Types are to be used as an identifier for what table the Fkey column is associated to, or what type of override it is. Not always associated to a database table. Example: TaskCollapse,SuppressLogOffMessage,AcctProcBreakdown. Do not reorder items, since they are numbers in the db.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 19 - Whether or not to set the perio auto advance to custom.

column.name: ConnectionType
column.summary: Enum:ConnectionTypes Used to distinguish the connection type.

column.name: Autotrigger
column.summary: Enum:EnumAutomationTrigger What triggers this automation

column.name: DefaultForTypes
column.summary: Enum:EnumQuickPasteType Each Category can be set to be the default category for multiple types of notes. Stored as integers separated by commas.

Enumeration.name: EnumQuickPasteType
Enumeration.summary: Each item in the enum should uniquely describe the location of a single TextBoxOD. No sharing. In many cases, this is tied to QuickPasteCat to determine which category to default to when opening.

column.name: GlobalTaskFilterType
column.summary: Enum:GlobalTaskFilterType 0=Disabled, 1=Default, 2=None, 3=Clinic, 4=Region. If a type is selected, then tasks in this tasklist will be filtered by default such that only tasks that match the tasklist's GlobalFilterType will show in the view. Disabled is not valid for tasklists and will be treated as Default if applied to a tasklist; it is only valid on the TasksGlobalFilterType preference.

column.name: ToolBar
column.summary: Enum:EnumToolBar The toolbar to show the button on.

column.name: FkeyType
column.summary: Enum:UserOdFkeyType Specifies which flag is overridden for the specified definition, since an individual definition can have multiple flags.

Enumeration.name: UserOdFkeyType
Enumeration.summary: These FKey Types are to be used as an identifier for what table the Fkey column is associated to, or what type of override it is. Not always associated to a database table. Example: TaskCollapse,SuppressLogOffMessage,AcctProcBreakdown. Do not reorder items, since they are numbers in the db.
